duties_responsibilities.duty: Sort, wash, and fold linens and towels with attention to detail and quality standards.
Ensure cleanliness and organization in the laundry room to maintain a safe and efficient work environment.
Operate laundry equipment safely, following operating procedures and safety guidelines.
Assist with inventory management and stock control for laundry supplies and linens.
Provide a positive and uplifting attitude, consistently displaying a willingness to assist others in any given situation.

education_certification.credential: Previous laundry experience preferred but not required
